title: 0xc0000005
body:
Im getting the 0xc0000005 error code. I do not use any antivirus. My windows is up to date.
2 days ago my game was working perfectly. I got to play yesterday and the game has to update. The update got to 100% and got stuck so i closed the window. When i tried to open the game again I get the 0xc0000005 error. I uninstalled and re downloaded/installed LoL, the old client window pops up and says, "The new client update has began". So I click launch then get the 0xc0000005 error. I dont use an antivirus as thats what all the fixes say to do........ Someone out there.. Please help me.

replies.body: So i contacted riot support and they got me to delete the launcher in the riot files. it did the trick

Did you do anything to have this problem occur? What was the cause of this problem because for me, I opened too many league clients, then I decided to end the process tree for each one. Then the problem with 0xc0000005 occurred for me...I don't know what you did to make it happen though.

Checking your antivirus was a good first step since sometimes League can get blocked by programs like that. Typically that 005 error means that your OS is blocking League from scanning it's game files, so go through and make sure your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) are still up to date!
